Mobiles.Name: hell hound
Mobiles.Long_Description: A hell hound stands here snarling at you.

Mobiles.Name: guardian demon
Mobiles.Long_Description: A huge guardian demon stands here, radiating evil.
Mobiles.Description: He glares at your and flexes his huge clawed hands.

Mobiles.Name: gremlin
Mobiles.Long_Description: A nasty little gremlin stands here, hopping from foot to foot.
Mobiles.Description: He grins wickedly at you through pointed little teeth.

Mobiles.Name: gremlin
Mobiles.Long_Description: A big ugly gremlin stands here, snarling angrilly.
Mobiles.Description: He snarls angrilly at you through long pointed fangs.

Mobiles.Name: gremlin
Mobiles.Long_Description: A huge vicious gremlin stands here, growling with anger.
Mobiles.Description: He growls viciously at you through huge curved tusks.

Mobiles.Name: cute fluffy creature
Mobiles.Long_Description: A cute little fluffy creature looks up at you, begging for food.
Mobiles.Description:
"Please, kind person, spare me some food?", he squeaks.  You consider 
stamping on the wretched little creature, but then decide it's not worth 
the mess it would make on your boots.

Mobiles.Name: mount
Mobiles.Long_Description: A generic mount stands here, waiting to be ridden.
Mobiles.Description: It looks like it would make a good mount...

Mobiles.Name: claymore
Mobiles.Long_Description: A Claymore mine is hiding in the corner.

Rooms.Name: A Stagnant swamp
Rooms.Description: You are standing knee high is some smelly shit.

Rooms.Name: The Dark Crypt
Rooms.Description:
You are standing within a small dark crypt.

There is a small sign that reads:

        Recharge incomplete cards
            at your own risk!

Exits.Description: Above you is a the temple altar.

Rooms.Name: The Disconnection Room
Rooms.Description:
This is the room where everyone goes just before they quit.  If you are a 
mortal you should *NOT* be here, so please get out...NOW.

RoomText_Data.Output: $n is engulfed in flames and vanishes into the ground!
RoomText_Data.ChOutput: You are engulfed in flames and vanish into the ground!
